turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get the try, the iced sugar-free mocha from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (s) Can I get that with the Oman milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like whipped cream as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Leave the whipped cream off.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a large iced sugar free mocha with almond milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can they do a shot of.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Can you Can you do a shot of vanilla in that, also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add a shot of vanilla to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see. I'm in San Francisco. I'm going to be near the location on Brannan Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's store on brannon street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye.
